definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Lung cancer and malignant mesothelioma are more common with asbestos inhalation and asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌和惡性間皮瘤亦和石綿吸入及石綿沉着病有關。

sentences.english: Crits and comments welcome. I'll get my asbestos gear out just in case .
sentences.chinese: 我將得到我的石綿以齒輪連起出僅僅以防萬一。
